game.name: Megazeux
game.desc: MegaZeux is a game engine that features hundreds of user-created games, mostly in a retro, tile-based style. The games cover various genres, including RPGs, platformers, and puzzles. They often use the engineâ€™s scripting system for unique mechanics and gameplay. With its simple graphics and creative possibilities, MegaZeux offers a wide variety of games to explore, all created by its community.
